explanation: This is an example of a data unit which is used to scape data from a web page. It has an example data units each consisting of data items that can be scraped from example page at example url, a description of each example item and data unit. It also contains scraping instructions such as which html tags to be included or excluded and attribute stack initial and increment information.  It also has a target success percentage for the data unit and each item.

data_units_example.title: Marc Bolan - N16
data_units_example.text: This is the penultimate house in the terrace before Maury Road, to the left.

data_units_example.title: Marc Bolan's London House in Hackney: The Early Years
data_units_example.text: born Mark Feld on 30/9/1947 grew up in London's

example_descriptions.data_unit: A data unit should have a title, link and text.  It is a single unit of information.
example_descriptions.title: Title of web page or article.  It is normally short and descriptive.
example_descriptions.link: An absolute web link to a page
example_descriptions.text: A short description of the page or article.  It is normally a sentence or two.
